short_summary: BPM022106 Brocade SANnav licenses (or equivalent) with support and maintenance
description: Shared Services Canada (SSC) has a requirement for the provision of Brocade SANnav licenses (or equivalent) with support and maintenance
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Brocade SANnav Licenses with Support and Maintenance

**Solicitation Number:** SSC-24-00027514:T

**Solicitation Description:**

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the provision of Brocade SANnav licenses (or equivalent) with support and maintenance.

**Key Dates:**

* **Tender Closing Date:** September 19, 2024 at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* **Bidder Inquiries:** Suppliers may inquire or submit emails to [tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

**Eligible Suppliers:**

* Pursuant to the Canada Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Pursuant to the Canada–Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Pursuant to the Canada–Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Pursuant to the Canada–Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Pursuant to the Canada–Korea Free Trade Agreement

**Notice Attachments:**

* Solicitation documentation is available on the P2P Portal
* URL: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public)

**Tender Description:**

The solicitation aims to procure Brocade SANnav licenses (or equivalent) with support and maintenance that meet SSC's operational requirements.

**End User Entities:**

* Shared Services Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Eric Lavigne
* 343-541-8756
* [tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

**Address:**

* 180 Kent Ottawa
* K1J 4A8
* CANADA

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada–Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada–Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Trade Classification:**

* ADP Input-Output and Storage Devices

This rewritten version maintains the essential details and clarifies the key dates, procurement requirements, and trade agreements involved. I have ensured that the text is concise and easy to read.
